00031 #ifndef _VBRFRAME_H
00032 #define _VBRFRAME_H
00033 
00034 #include "in1out.h"
00035 
00036 class   vbrframe:       public in1out {
00037 typedef in1out  baseclass;
00038 public: 
00039         void    init(void);
00040         void    early(event *);
00041         rec_typ REC(data *, int);
00042         void    restim(void);
00043         
00044         tim_typ *table_delta;   //distribution table for DELTA - frames distance
00045         tim_typ *table_len;     //distribution table for LEN - length of frames
00046         int     delta_dist;     //existence of delta distribution, default=0
00047         int     len_dist;       //existence of len distribution
00048         int     len_dist_count; //first frame taken from distribution
00049         
00050         rec_typ send_state;
00051         tim_typ send_time;      // time for next request if stopped
00052         size_t  pkt_len;        // length of frames to be send
00053         tim_typ delta;          // send interval 
00054         size_t  bytes;          // number of bytes to be send
00055         size_t  sent;           // number of bytes sent
00056         tim_typ StartTime;      // Sim time to start sending
00057         tim_typ EndTime;        // Sim time to finish sending
00058 };
00059 
00060 #endif  // _VBRFRAME_H
